title: 159 - Arod's Revenge
description: Todays ship is steered by Boston Connor as him and the boys jump into the latest movies as Tone gives his opinions on Kevin Hearts latest Netflix movie as Connor has completely switched his stance on The Boys tv show. They soon then jump into the Pod FOD which covers everything around the internet from Arod getting back at Ben Affleck, cars being impaled by flying wood, and much more in between. Don't forget to subscribe to YouTube.com/thepodpmi to watch full episodes of The Pod, and send your questions to @ThePodPMI on twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all for listening, and hope you have an incredible weekend. We'll see you Friday.
